data.name: Rescue
data.description: An armored hero who protects allies with her barrier and enhances Power Armor allies' attacks.

starItems.name: Rescue
starItems.description: An armored hero who protects allies with her barrier and enhances Power Armor allies' attacks.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Chain to an adjacent target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to each target

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. Chain to an adjacent target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to each target.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Always apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to each target

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage. Chain to an adjacent target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to each target.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. Chain to an adjacent target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to each target.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage. Chain to an adjacent target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to each target.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage. Chain to an adjacent target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to each target.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to each target

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage. Chain to an adjacent target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to each target.

1.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from each target and redistribute <color=#86e619>100%</color> of the Health stolen to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade: <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies.
2.nextUpgrade:

Apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies

7.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from each target and redistribute <color=#86e619>500%</color> of the Health stolen to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

1.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all allies.
1.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self, <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color>, and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies

2.description:

2.nextUpgrade:

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies

3.description:

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
Now Costs <color=#86e619>6</color> Ability Energy
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health
Apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

4.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self and all allies.
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
Start with <color=#86e619>3</color> Ability Energy
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

5.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects from self and all allies.

5.nextUpgrade:

6.description:
Clear all negative effects from self and all allies.
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self, <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color>, and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.
6.nextUpgrade: Revive a dead <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally with <color=#86e619>60%</color> Max health

7.description:
Revive a dead <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally with <color=#86e619>60%</color> Max health.

Clear all negative effects from self and all allies.
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self, <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color>, and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.

1.description:
When this character or any ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Barrier that character for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On Death of an Iron Man (Infinity War) ally, clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies, then apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.

On Spawn:
> Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>WAR</color> and <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when this character or any ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Barrier that character for an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health

2.description:
When this character or any ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Barrier that character for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color> and <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Barrier that character for an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On Death of an Iron Man (Infinity War) ally, clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies, then apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.

On Spawn:
> Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
On enemy Turn, if that character has <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>, Heal self and all <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this characters Max Health
On Spawn, +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Barrier

3.description:
When this character or any ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Barrier that character for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color> and <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Barrier that character for an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On enemy Turn, if that character has <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>, Heal self and all <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this characters Max Health.

On Death of an Iron Man (Infinity War) ally, clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies, then apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.

On Spawn:
> Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

4.description:
When this character or any ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Barrier that character for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color> and <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Barrier that character for an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On enemy Turn, if that character has <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>, Heal self and all <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this characters Max Health.

On Death of an Iron Man (Infinity War) ally, clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies, then apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.

On Spawn:
> Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, on Death of any <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally, fill Speed Bar for this character by <color=#86e619>50%</color> + generate <color=#86e619>3</color> Ability Energy for self
On Spawn, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Barrier

5.description:
When this character or any ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Barrier that character for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color> and <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Barrier that character for an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On enemy Turn, if that character has <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>, Heal self and all <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this characters Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.

On Spawn:
> Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color> and <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, On Death of any <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally, fill Speed Bar for this character by <color=#86e619>50%</color> + generate <color=#86e619>3</color> Ability Energy for self.
